name: tm09
effect: Teaches Bullet Seed to a compatible Pokémon.
short_effect: Teaches Venoshock to a compatible Pokémon. (Gen IV & III: Bullet Seed Gen II: Psych Up Gen I: Take Down)

flavor_text_entries.ruby-sapphire:
Shoots 2 to 5 seeds
in a row to strike
the foe.
flavor_text_entries.emerald:
Shoots 2 to 5 seeds
in a row to strike
the foe.
flavor_text_entries.firered-leafgreen:
The user shoots
seeds at the foe.
Two to five seeds
are shot at once.
flavor_text_entries.diamond-pearl:
The user forcefully shoots seeds at
the foe. Two to five seeds are shot in
rapid succession.
flavor_text_entries.platinum:
The user forcefully shoots seeds at
the foe. Two to five seeds are shot in
rapid succession.
flavor_text_entries.heartgold-soulsilver:
The user forcefully shoots seeds at
the foe. Two to five seeds are shot in
rapid succession.
flavor_text_entries.black-white:
The user drenches the target in a
special poisonous liquid. Its power
is doubled if the target is poisoned.
flavor_text_entries.black-2-white-2:
The user drenches the target in a
special poisonous liquid. Its power
is doubled if the target is poisoned.
flavor_text_entries.x-y:
The user drenches the target in a special
poisonous liquid. This move’s power is
doubled if the target is poisoned.
flavor_text_entries.sun-moon:
The user drenches the target in a special
poisonous liquid. This move’s power is doubled
if the target is poisoned.
flavor_text_entries.ultra-sun-ultra-moon:
The user drenches the target in a special
poisonous liquid. This move’s power is doubled
if the target is poisoned.
flavor_text_entries.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee:
A wondrous wall of light is put up to reduce damage
from physical attacks for five turns.
flavor_text_entries.sword-shield:
The user charges at the target using every bit of its
power. The user can’t move on the next turn.
